abstract: Ms. Singer came to T from Vogue in 2010. Jill Abramson, the executive editor of The Times, said the newspaper was looking immediately for a replacement.
snippet: Ms. Singer came to T from Vogue in 2010. Jill Abramson, the executive editor of The Times, said the newspaper was looking immediately for a replacement.
lead_paragraph: Sally Singer, the editor of The New York Times style magazine T for the last two years, is leaving.

headline.main: Sally Singer, Editor of The Times’s T Magazine, Is Leaving
